osvSchema.details: Multilaser RE160 v5.07.51_pt_MTL01 and v5.07.52_pt_MTL01, Multilaser RE160V v12.03.01.08_pt and V12.03.01.09_pt, and Multilaser RE163V v12.03.01.08_pt allows attackers to bypass the access control and gain complete access to the application via supplying a crafted URL.

description_data.value: Multilaser RE160 v5.07.51_pt_MTL01 and v5.07.52_pt_MTL01, Multilaser RE160V v12.03.01.08_pt and V12.03.01.09_pt, and Multilaser RE163V v12.03.01.08_pt allows attackers to bypass the access control and gain complete access to the application via supplying a crafted URL.

reference_data.name: 20240302 Multilaser Router - Access Control Bypass through URL Manipulation - CVE-2023-38945

descriptions.value: Multilaser RE160 v5.07.51_pt_MTL01 and v5.07.52_pt_MTL01, Multilaser RE160V v12.03.01.08_pt and V12.03.01.09_pt, and Multilaser RE163V v12.03.01.08_pt allows attackers to bypass the access control and gain complete access to the application via supplying a crafted URL.

Multilaser RE160 v5.07.51_pt_MTL01 y v5.07.52_pt_MTL01, Multilaser RE160V v12.03.01.08_pt y V12.03.01.09_pt, y Multilaser RE163V v12.03.01.08_pt permiten a los atacantes eludir el control de acceso y obtener acceso completo a la aplicación mediante el suministro una URL manipulada.
